Text:
Note to downloaders: Please be aware that I have a restricted bandwidth allowance, so the download may take a while, as I have quite a few active torrents. You will get the files eventually, but please seed for as long as possible.
If you get tired of waiting, you could always buy the CD. Loopmasters is a great company, so send some cash to them! ;)
